name: IOUSBHostIOSourceDescriptors
desc: The descriptors for a single endpoint.

items.name: var bcdUSB: UInt16
items.desc: The USB version that the device supports.

items.name: var descriptor: IOUSBEndpointDescriptor
items.desc: The descriptor for a USB endpoint.

items.name: var ssCompanionDescriptor: IOUSBSuperSpeedEndpointCompanionDescriptor
items.desc: The descriptor for a SuperSpeed USB endpoint companion.

items.name: var sspCompanionDescriptor: IOUSBSuperSpeedPlusIsochronousEndpointCompanionDescriptor
items.desc: The descriptor for a SuperSpeedPlus isochronous USB endpoint companion.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates a new source descriptor structure.

items.name: init(bcdUSB: UInt16, descriptor: IOUSBEndpointDescriptor, ssCompanionDescriptor: IOUSBSuperSpeedEndpointCompanionDescriptor, sspCompanionDescriptor: IOUSBSuperSpeedPlusIsochronousEndpointCompanionDescriptor)
items.desc: Creates a new source descriptor structure.
